title: Sunfire Phoenix
text: The Sunfire Phoenix is a majestic creature composed of living solar plasma. It is said to be a messenger of the Sun God, appearing only during the height of summer. Its feathers burn with the intensity of a star, and its cry can banish shadows. Unlike the Noble Phoenix, which represents rebirth, the Sunfire Phoenix represents judgment and purification.
image_prompt: A dangerous Magical Beast creature known as Sunfire Phoenix. A bird of prey made of blinding white and gold fire.
name: Sunfire Phoenix
description: A Magical Beast known as Sunfire Phoenix that embodies the sun's wrath.
